teamsdetails.title: Targaryens
teamsdetails.description: Targayens team is the one of the three teams in Engineers Park. The team members of this team are 'Manoj Manager' and 'Manoj David Boon'.

teamsdetails.title: Leninsters
teamsdetails.description: Leninsters team is the one of the three teams in Engineers Park. The team members of this team are 'Pramod Prayagraji' and 'Mountain man'.

teamsdetails.title: Starks
teamsdetails.description: Starks team is the one of the three teams in Engineers Park. The team members of this team are 'Rajeev Narialpani' and 'Guru Ji'.

matches.title: Match between Targaryens and Lenninsters
matches.description: After a tight fight between both the teams, Targaryens managed to secure the win in this game.

matches.title: Match between Leninsters and Rocks
matches.description: Rocks wins the match very easily.

matches.title: Match between Lenninsters and Targaryens
matches.description: Poor Lenninsters worked very hard but unfortunately they could not secure the win in this game as Targaryens overshadowed the Lennisters in all the departments of the game.
